sentences.sContent: Select a worksheet, macro sheet or chart sheet.

sentences.sCn: 选定工作表、宏表或图表工作表。

sentences.sContent: Prepare and i ue the meeting notice to the participants , including the completed retro ective plaing worksheet.
sentences.sContent_eng: Prepare and i ue the meeting notice to the participants , including the completed retro ective plaing worksheet.
sentences.sCn: 准备并给与会者发出会议通知，同时发出已完成的回顾计划工作表。

sentences.sContent: How to copy the value out of a message box and hold in the memory so the result can be pasted into any cell on a worksheet.
sentences.sContent_eng: How to copy the value out of a message box and hold in the memory so the result can be pasted into any cell on a worksheet.
sentences.sCn: 如何将值从一个消息框，并保持在记忆中这样的结果可以被粘贴到工作表上的任何细胞。
